statements: CREATE TABLE teams (team_id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50), team_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id));

CREATE TABLE matches (match_id INT PRIMARY KEY, match_date DATE, team1_id INT, team2_id INT, winner_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (team1_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id), FOREIGN KEY (team2_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id), FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id));
CREATE TABLE teams (team_id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE team (team_id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, team_id INT NOT NULL, age INT, FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team(team_id))

CREATE TABLE match (match_id INT PRIMARY KEY, match_date DATE NOT NULL, team1_id INT NOT NULL, team2_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (team1_id) REFERENCES team(team_id), FOREIGN KEY (team2_id) REFERENCES team(team_id))
